nodes.description: 自杀式炸弹袭击奎达反脊灰中心，造成至少15人死亡
nodes.support_text: A suicide bomber killed at least 15 people close to a polio eradication centre in Quetta on Wednesday, the latest militant attack on the anti-polio campaign in the country.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致12名警察、1名 paramilitary军官和2名平民死亡
nodes.support_text: The latest attack killed at least 12 policemen, one paramilitary officer and two civilians, and wounded 25 others, officials said.

nodes.description: 救援人员与目击者向Geo News报告爆炸地点
nodes.support_text: Rescue workers and eyewitnesses told Geo News that the blast took place near a police van outside a polio vaccination centre in the area.

nodes.description: Balochistan警察局长确认自杀式爆炸，护送队伍已抵达
nodes.support_text: Ahsan Mehboob, police chief in Balochistan, told Reuters. 'It was a suicide blast, we have gathered evidence from the scene,' he said.

nodes.description: 爆炸物含约5公斤炸药，25人受伤
nodes.support_text: They estimated the bomb contained about five kilograms of explosives.

nodes.description: 伤者被送至Civil Hospital Quetta，8人重伤并宣布紧急状态
nodes.support_text: The injured were shifted to Civil Hospital Quetta, where a state of emergency was declared.

nodes.description: 两辆警车在爆炸中损毁
nodes.support_text: Two police vehicles were also damaged in the explosion.

nodes.description: WHO指出巴基斯坦与阿富汗是仅有的脊灰流行国家
nodes.support_text: The World Health Organization (WHO) says. Pakistan and neighbouring Afghanistan are the only two countries in the world where polio remains endemic.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦疫苗团队频繁遭塔利班等组织袭击
nodes.support_text: Teams in Pakistan working to immunise children against the virus are often targeted by Taliban and other militant groups.

nodes.description: 高官从爆炸地点找到炸弹碎片
nodes.support_text: 高官从爆炸地点找到炸弹碎片

edges.support_text: The latest attack killed at least 12 policemen, one paramilitary officer and two civilians, and wounded 25 others, officials said.
Rescue workers and eyewitnesses told Geo News that the blast took place near a police van outside a polio vaccination centre in the area.
Ahsan Mehboob, police chief in Balochistan, told Reuters. 'It was a suicide blast, we have gathered evidence from the scene,' he said.
Two police vehicles were also damaged in the explosion.
The injured were shifted to Civil Hospital Quetta, where a state of emergency was declared.
They estimated the bomb contained about five kilograms of explosives.
高官从爆炸地点找到炸弹碎片
Teams in Pakistan working to immunise children against the virus are often targeted by Taliban and other militant groups.
